sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pAAV-mDlx-GCaMP6f-Fishell-2 was a gift from Gordon Fishell (Addgene plasmid # 83899 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:83899 ; RRID:Addgene_83899) For viral preps, please replace (Addgene plasmid # 83899) in the above sentence with: (Addgene viral prep # 83899-AAV1), (Addgene viral prep # 83899-AAV9), or (Addgene viral prep # 83899-AAVrg)
